name: Debbie's Amazing Apple Bread
author: Melissa Jennings Lake
summary: I was given this recipe years ago by my friend Debbie. I've had it written down on a torn piece of paper for years and decided today that this recipe needs to be on AllRecipes. It is a moist, sweet, and delicious bread with a crispy crust.  By far my favorite bread recipe!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Beat eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, and vanilla extract in a mixing bowl; add apples
Mix flour, salt, baking powder, and cinnamon in a separate bowl; add to apple mixture and stir just until evenly combined into a thick batter
Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes
Cover loaf pan with aluminum foil; continue baking until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 minutes more
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
